name: Vu Tran Phuong Thuy
greetingText: Your name is my absolute favorite; it holds a special place in my hearttttt
wishText: Darling, on your special day, may every moment be as sweet as your smile, and may all your dreams come true. Happy birthday, my loveeeeeeee
text1: It's my angel, my all, my chÃ©rie birthdayyyyy
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to my flower!! Yeee! I love you ski bi di dop dop yes yes...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Alright, Tiny, bae you can cumback to tongtai TaLo and tell me your thoughts on it.
replayText: Or bae you can click, if you want to watch it again.
